testcase.name: CSW geeft capabilities
testcase.system-out: Given url 'http://nationaalgeoregister.nl/geonetwork/srv/dut/csw' ........ passed And param request = 'GetCapabilities' ..................................... passed And param service = 'CSW' ................................................. passed When method GET ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match karate.xmlPath(response, '/Capabilities/ServiceIdentification/ServiceTypeVersion') == '2.0.2' . passed And match karate.xmlPath(response, '/Capabilities/ServiceIdentification/Title') == "CSW Nationaal Georegister (NGR)" . passed
